channel.title: Hugo on Pietro F. Maggi
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Pietro F. Maggi

item.title: Welcome
item.author: pfm@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: Time for revamping a bit this blog. From a technical point of view, I struggled with octopress v2.x to keep this blog aligned across the multiple machine I use in my work/life. Octopress v3 is supposed to solve most of the issue that plagued me over these years but, I wanted to test something a bit different. New year new static blog generator. Given that I want to spend some time evaluating Go I decided to give Hugo a try.
